segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the other side of the kitchen now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy on a wobbly stool, reaching into a cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable, its legs splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching himself to get those cookies, it's quite a reach.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little sister is right there, with her hand held out expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's clearly waiting for her share of the sweet loot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic case of children trying to sneak a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel the tension in the air as he balances.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A fall from that height onto a potentially wet floor would be very bad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to yell out and tell him to be careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The label 'COOKIE JAR' is so prominent, almost inviting the mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get hurt or cause more chaos in this already chaotic room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They look so focused on their mission, utterly oblivious to other dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a daring act for such small children, I must admit.
segments.speaker: PAR
